segments.description: A close-up of a young woman in her late teens with curly brown hair, frowning as she examines her acne in a mirror. The camera slowly pushes in on her distressed face, capturing her frustration and concern. The background is softly blurred to keep the focus on her emotions, creating a relatable moment of struggle.
